Articles.Content:
Have you ever wanted to delivery a rover to Duna, Laythe or Eve, but because of DRE it was hard to do so? I know there are some good mods out there, but I really haven't seen any rover dedicated mods, and the ones I have seen are either abandoned or put on hold. Well, I give you Rover Delivery System(WIP Name).

(Image courtesy of Blackheart216)

I made this mod with blackheart to give you guys a safe and reliable way of getting your rover, whether it be unmanned or manned, safely on the ground of any planet or moon.

What's going to be in the first release:

2.5 RDS

This includes a skycrane fuel tank, two skycrane engine packs(One of them has three tiny nozzles, and the other is a curiosity inspired thruster pack, not show in pic), a protective cover, the heat shield/rover carry platform, adapter plate, custom orbiter/deorbit fuel tank, and a interstage fairing.

I had planned on releasing a 3m and 5m RDS in later releases, but if testing goes good me and Blackheart might push them out in the first release.

Looking to make a team for this mod

Team so far:

Modelers: GoldForest

Texturer: BlackHeart

Config: Looking

Unity: Blackheart

Part Animator: Looking

I think that's all for now. I will update this if I missed anything or anything needs to be added.

Edit: Forgot to mention that we would like someone who can do DRE and FAR configs as well.

Edited November 6, 2014 by GoldForest

Interesting. Why does ist say 'looking for a team' if you almost have the complete team together? Anyway, if you need somebody to help out you could ask me, I also have some other jobs to do but I have holidays and I should manage that. I could be a help in modelling, I can texture but not so good and I have Unity. Send me a pm if you need me...

Because Im kinda busy irl atm and barely have any time to develop the mods I am affiliated with. Things such as config editing which needs a lot of testing back and forth for ksp takes a lot of time so I just model from time to time.

Because Im kinda busy irl atm and barely have any time to develop the mods I am affiliated with. Things such as config editing which needs a lot of testing back and forth for ksp takes a lot of time so I just model from time to time.

It's okay Blackheart. Life hits everyone and we understand that. Whatever you can give us is great and I'm glad to have you on this team.

An update:

1) All the parts are textured and put through unity.

2) We still need a config maker.
I have dabbled in configs, and have much free time. I shall volunteer! Might as well start my modding career somewhere.
